Description:
Marketing Executive - Safat HomeThe marketing executive will be involved in developing marketing campaigns to promote Safat Home products and services. It will be a varied role that includes planning, advertising, public relations, event organization, product development, distribution, sponsorship, and research.Essential Job Roles:Coordinating in the execution of marketing communications across all HD brands under the supervision of Asst. Marketing Manager
Following up on daily tasks with the appointed PR agency.
Developing and maintaining marketing collateral, rate cards, newsletters, brochures, and many other materials related to marketing.
Executing a wide variety of details that involve direct mail, social media, marketing trade shows and events, public relations, customer communications, media advertisements, promotions, and other marketing plans.
Monitoring competition in all daily newspapers
Maintaining communication open lines with all organizations and providing prompt answers to requests in order to determine how to convey concise, clear, and timely selective information.
Manage product image library on Marketing Network
Manage marketing communication archive; compile all campaign communication and save on Marketing
Developing standardized presentations, sales scripts, and proposals.
Writing and editing press releases.
Implementing project management system for documenting and tracking activities.
Attending tradeshows, company-sponsored promotions, and events.
Monitoring competitors for tracking communications related to the brand of a company.
Executing and analyzing results of advertisement and marketing campaigns.
Preparing monthly marketing calendars and updating them.
Analyze marketing campaigns to determine their success and effectiveness (Evaluate different KPIs)
Analyze market and customer data to gain insight into the business (analysis on market share, competition, database, etc) 
Generate weekly marketing report in relation to the week’s activities across the different comms channels based on the provided reporting template(s) covering all regions
Liaise internally and externally with the HF team, agency, Group Control, showroom, and suppliers to conduct and finalize marketing activities.
Develop and update quarterly promotions calendar in coordination with B&MSkills
